Text: Any suggestions on how to get rid of the Webpage nag that comes up when using these keys?

All xplorer releases here have the same problem. If you try to rename the file, the warez website opens and you have to reenter the registration code to keep using the program.
I've never found the solution of it.
maybe we can find out what ip(s) it phones home to and block them in our hosts file?

Seems like it is working, add "127.0.0.1 www.zabkat.com" to your hosts file & restart your computer.

I also added it's ip (82.165.115.192) to my peerblock block lists as well.

http://www.mvps.org/winhelp2002/hosts.htm

http://www.peerblock.com/userguide/how_to_use/htu-creatinglists

also, xplorer2 seems to delete your settings when it has its little "not paid for" shit-fit, so save & export that when you get it to your liking.
